author: A_Brickset_user
title: Not bad
review: I,ve bought this because the monkey and the parts. The pirate is not bad but he is a bit to large with my old pirates maybe he can be something like a giant pirate or so. The monkey and the brown round brick(2*2) are new brown, a little bit more reddish. The scimitars are good. Ther were 2 rubies or diamonds in this set. He was 3,49 euro, in other shops 3,99 euro. Maybe a little bit to expensive

author: Legoman1993
title: not bad
review: My brother get this set because he wanted the Rare orange Diamond! Monkey! and the swords!My brother does not have much lego swords anyway! He really liked this set! I wish I could buy this set My self! for the monkey! this set got to be the cheapest way to get a monkey! But I think they sold out of them in Canada!

author: mrmitch
title: I finally have a LEGO monkey !!
review: We collect the 4 Juniors Pirates sets and I saw this one for only $2.00 US and had to have it. For years I have been collecting LEGO'S but did not have a monkey until this set. Two swords another Pirate and of course the monkey. Good Set !

author: GeorgeGilliatt
title: monkey!
review: This set was sat in my local newsagents for months and months and i felt sorry for it so i just bought it. The only piece from it i ever play with is monkey. I put all the pieces into my collection and i havent a clue where the person is. The monkeyis my favourite lego animal, right above the dragon and the cow!
